name: YouTube Premium Student Plan
description: YouTube Premium and Music for $7.99/month for college students
fullDescription: YouTube Premium offers college students a discounted rate of $7.99/month (normally $13.99), including YouTube Music Premium, ad-free viewing, and background play.
whatTheyOffer:
- YouTube Premium for $7.99/month (43% off)
- YouTube Music Premium included
- Ad-free videos on YouTube
- Background play on mobile
- Video downloads for offline viewing
- Available for up to 4 years
howToGetIt:
1. Visit youtube.com/premium/student
2. Sign in with Google account
3. Verify student status through SheerID
4. Must be at accredited higher education institution
5. Re-verify enrollment annually
keywords: YouTube Premium, student discount, ad-free, YouTube Music, background play, college, university
